<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gnome Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=37) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 45 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Gnome Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=30)

</column>

---

Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), and all [gnome](/Traits.aspx?ID=80) weapons in which you are trained.
name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
